summary: Frontend testing of NotCluely calendar application revealed critical DateTime display issue still exists and modal overlay problems persist. Backend API returning 422 errors for booking creation.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 422 status code when creating bookings with valid data

ui_bugs.issue: Still displays 'Invalid DateTime' instead of proper month/year format
Dialog overlay intercepting clicks, preventing button interactions after first dialog
Admin indicator not showing for user 'rutvik', conflicts button not visible

integration_issues.issue: 422 API errors preventing booking creation, form submission fails
Cannot interact with buttons after first modal due to overlay interception

passed_tests: Booking form fields can be filled
Existing bookings display on calendar (7 bookings found)
Dark theme styling is properly applied

success_percentage.frontend: 40% (basic navigation works but core functionality broken)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix DateTime display in calendar header (still shows 'Invalid DateTime'). Fix modal overlay z-index issues preventing button clicks. Resolve 422 API errors in booking creation endpoint. Verify admin user detection for 'rutvik'.
